scripts.start: concurrently - - kill-others "npm run server" "sleep 10 && npm run client"
scripts.setup: npm install && cd api && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.dump: mongodump -h ds023463.mlab.com:23463 -d building-vermont -u historyman -p 17-prides-of-peacocks -o ./api/seeds && mongorestore -d building-vermont ./api/seeds/building-vermont
